pkgmetadata.longdescription: # fastapi-rfc7807[FastAPI](https://fastapi.tiangolo.com/) middleware which translates server-side exceptionsinto [RFC-7807](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7807) compliant problem detail error responses.## Installation`fastapi_rfc7807` requires Python 3.6+```pip install fastapi_rfc7807```## UsageBelow is a simple example which shows the bare minimum needed to configure a FastAPI applicationwith `fastapi_rfc7807`.```pythonfrom fastapi import FastAPI from fastapi_rfc7807 import middlewareapp = FastAPI()middleware.register(app)@app.get('/error')async def error(): raise ValueError('something went wrong')```The resulting error returned from the server looks like:```console$ curl localhost:8000/error{"exc_type":"ValueError","type":"about:blank","title":"Unexpected Server Error","status":500,"detail":"something went wrong"}```See the [examples](examples) directory for additional examples.
